commit message: DownloadReceiver: workaround rare NPE in DownloadManager SDK class

PlayerService: pause playback on audio device disconnect

WidgetHelper: rework widget update code again

- tolerate system-ui process crashes/restarts
- handle homescreen widget full update

add 'Pause on headphones disconnect' preference

add 'delete and do nothing' to playback complete actions

Storage: fix storage options detection for Android 4.1-4.3

look up environment variables to find non-primary external storages
MainActivity: generalize snackbar-related code
delete eps in background service & show snackbar with 'undo' button
minor improvements to logging
a bunch of minor changes in docstrings and comments
SearchElementHolder: hide description view if description is empty
make links in podcast and episode descriptions clickable
add d/l states needed to move d/l processing to background service
get rid of some unnecessary explicit toString conversions

move download processing to PodcastOperations service
update podcast catalogue
gradle: bump version to 1.2.2
